products.name: R.W.FLAME 68 inch Recessed and Wall Mounted Electric Fireplace
products.description: Transform any room into a cozy retreat with this sleek 68-inch electric fireplace insert. The ultra-slim design (only 3.86" deep) fits seamlessly into your space while delivering powerful zone heating up to 400 square feet. Choose from 12 stunning flame colors and customize brightness to match your mood. ETL safety certified with overheat protection and natural humidity preservation - no dry air discomfort. Energy-efficient dual heating modes (750W/1500W) let you stay warm without breaking the bank. Perfect for living rooms, bedrooms, or offices. Installation is simple, operation is effortless with both touchscreen and remote control.

products.name: LUXE Bidet NEO 120
products.description: Upgrade your bathroom with premium comfort and sustainability. This sleek bidet attachment features high-pressure valves with metal-ceramic cores, durable steel hoses, and self-retracting nozzles with hygienic guard gate protection. Installs in minutes on any standard two-piece toilet with all tools included. Save money on toilet paper, reduce environmental impact, and enjoy a gentler, cleaner experience every day.
features: Retractable nozzles, protective guard gate, and built to fit most toilet setups.
Slide-in Installation, Advanced 360Â° Self-Clean Mode, and Lift-to-Clean Hinges.
Doft-close, quick-release, and designed to fit any bidet attachment.
